name: device_close
description: This function is used to fully close or partially close (use percent % for some) SmartThings devices with an on/off function.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to close.

parameters.name: ration
parameters.description: The percentage to close the device.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to close the device.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to perform on the devices.
